column1: •  Educational  qualifications:  Pass  GCE  O/L  exams  with  simple
passes in six subjects including one of language (Sinhala/ Tamil)
and pure math, basic math, and combined math in no more than
two  sittings.  Candidate  must  have  passed  five  subjects  in  one
sitting,  of  which,  the  candidate  should  have  credit  passes  for
